name: Zero Tours
storyline:
A wide and wide world...a world of people called ``Kigurumians'' who live their lives wearing kigurumi.There,
many races lived quietly...

a long time ago...even in such a peaceful world, there was a great conflict.
This battle was fought by a mysterious secret organization in order to control this world.However, the
Kigurumians worked together and won this battle.Just

as the memories of the battle were still hazy, two babies were born in the Village of Hope. It became something I could entrust with...

...with a dragon amulet...
summary:
This is a Game Boy Advance RPG from Media Rings Corporation, released on July 27th 2001. It is also known as Mugen Kinogyou Zero Tours.
The game features characters known as Kigurumians (キグルミアン) who like to dress up as different animals. You can battle monsters (known as Nuigurumin) in dungeons and register them. Using a link cable, you may exchange items and Nuigurumin data.
